top-desc: Please fill in your card details so we can check eligibility for the program.
desc-1: For your convenience, your card details will be securely saved in app for future use. You will never be charged without your confirmation.
desc-2: Make sure it matches the name on your passport.
desc-3: We’ll send you booking confirmations and receipts.
would-like-receive: I would like to receive updates on special offers, products, services and feedback opportunities.
agree-terms-err: Please read and agree to the Terms & Conditions to continue.
t&c: I agree to DragonPass’ Privacy Policy, Terms of Use and Terms and Conditions, and allow DragonPass to collect my personal information for use in relation to this Program.
sign-up-completed: Sign up completed. Your Fast Track entitlements have been set up and are ready to use. A confirmation email will follow shortly.
membership-desc: Membership linked with your Mastercard® ending {l4}
reject-card: Your card couldn't be verified to create an account.
warn-card: Please check your card is valid and you have entered the correct card number, expiry date and CVC during sign up.
